channel.title: The Ultimate Prank!
channel.description:
What you do is, get your friends bookbag and replace all his books with a small speaker that has about the same wieght as the book(s) combined. Have a button, controller to control the speaker. Now when he gets to a mid-crowded public place, press the button. Then these sound affects will play, going, "UHHHHHHHHHH OOOOHH YEAAAAAAAHhhhh!!" and so forth!
Post if you can top that.

alriht a new 1. host a fake pron photo session at someones house and see who turns up at that person’s house!

item.title: The Ultimate Prank!
item.dc:creator: @Hex_Key Hex Key
item.description:
@Hex_Key wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:12, topic:83749”][quote author=Hex Key link=topic=123060.msg1205580#msg1205580 date=1177368877]
bicardonate of soda in tomato sauce is awesome.

put 2 teaspoons in the top of the bottle but do not shake, replace it in the fridge gently.
when the next persone takes it out to use it, it will explode. firing sauce all over the place.

PWNT
[/quote]

That work with like Heinz Ketchup?[/quote]

especially heinz ketchup, anything acid based. tomato sauce is one of the best though

Read full topic

item.title: The Ultimate Prank!
item.dc:creator: @Bebemycat2 Bebe
item.description:
@Bebemycat2 wrote:

Hex Key, that is very old though. People would still fall for it but most people would catch on within seconds.

There are a lot funnier things you can do to a friend while they are in public. I find the the best pranks/jokes aren’t on the friend but the people watching. It’s fun to mess with them

Read full topic

how about putshit on a newspaper then put the news paper on a doorstep then set the news paper on fire and ring the bell or knock, hopfully the paper will not have gone out so they will stamp on it and get shit on there sock/shoes/feet

super glue a $2 coin (or eny coin of higher value) to the ground in a busy place, sit on a bench close and watch the n00bs who try to pick it up.
